channel.title: Torso-related thingy WIP
channel.description:
So pretty much I got bored and decided to open up Blender. I started making a torso, but I'm not sure what to make of it. Maybe a human body, maybe some form of armor or clothing, I don't know :| Here is the progress so far: [img]http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/395/torsol.jpg[/img]
And currently, its perfectly round :| I don't know how to scale in one direction yet.

item.title: Torso-related thingy WIP
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

to scale in a certain axis: [S] then hit either [X][Y][Z] or you can hit [S] and middle mouse button drag on a certain axis. Also, you can type in values (i.e [S][X][2] will double the size of it in the X axis.)

Read full topic

item.title: Torso-related thingy WIP
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

…Ummmm is it like a scaled cylinder? It looks like it to me XD nothing done to it really XD, wait just noticed that you said you can’t scale it in one direction yet XD, try hovering your mouse over the end of the arrow then clicking and dragging left right, or up and down.

Read full topic
